annotation: Satellite measurements of Arctic sea ice begin
title: Arctic Sea Ice Decline
intro: These images show annual minimum Arctic sea ice cover from 1979 to 2015.
fastfacts: The Arctic is the fastest warming region in the world.
moreinfo: Stroeve et al. (2007) "Arctic sea ice decline: Faster than forecast"

fastfacts: Climate models predict that the Arctic will be sea ice-free in the summer by the 2030s.

annotation: On August 21, the Northwest Passage became open to ships without the help of an icebreaker
Arctic sea ice reaches a minimum extent of 3.41 million sq km, a record low since satellite measurements began
Ice greater than 4 years old accounted for only 7% of all Arctic sea ice, compared to 26% in 1988
